description: Add client-side JS to support hierarchical hide/show of descendant rows.
Add hover highlight so predecessor/successor tasks visually respond.
Import example dependency links and validate import pipeline.
Add inner bar to visualize % complete on Gantt bars.
Restore removed UI behavior after Gantt timeline changes.
Add model-level rollup date aggregation for parents.
notes: update_rollup_dates now implemented and called from rollup_wbs_dates.
